game2D

Class GameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • game2D.GameWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReefWorld

    public abstract class GameWorld
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
    GameWorld represents the gaming environment. It keeps track of game objects. It has methods to add and remove game objects and iterate through them. It also has methods to detect and resolve collision between objects, and draw game objects. Extend GameWorld to create specific games using the Game2D engine.
    Author:
    Fudou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setDimensions

        public void setDimensions(int w,
                          int h)
        Sets the dimension of game window
        Parameters:
        w - Width of game window in pixels
        h - Height of game window in pixels

      • playerBackgroundCollision

        public void playerBackgroundCollision()
        Detects collision between player and background objects. Once a collision is detected, it repositions the player.

      • playerPlayerCollision

        public void playerPlayerCollision()
        Detects collision between two players. Once a collision is detected, it repositions the player based on who is moving.

      • playerEnemyCollision

        public void playerEnemyCollision()
        Detects collision between player and enemy objects. Once a collision is detected, it simply repositions the player.

      • playerPowerUpCollision

        public void playerPowerUpCollision()
        Detects collision between player and PowerUp objects. Once a collision is detected, the player gets the weapon from the PowerUp object, and the PowerUp object dissapears.

      • bulletBackgroundCollision

        public void bulletBackgroundCollision()
        Detects collision between bullet and background objects. Generate explosion upon collision, damage the ground object, and destroys the bullet

      • bulletPlayerCollision

        public void bulletPlayerCollision()
        Detects collision between bullet and players. Generate explosion upon collision, damage the player object only if (a) the palyer is not respawning; (b) the player is not the owner of the bullet. Then destroys the bullet.
